com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.annotation

Annotation Type Bind

  • Deprecated. 
    moved to new namespace

    @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Bind
    Annotation to bind variables to the Action. 
     
   class MyAction implements Action {
 
      @Bind String rendermode;
      @Bind("myVar") String theVariable;
      @Bind(scope="session") ShoppingCart cart;
 
     public void handleRequest(ICS ics){
         if("live".equals(rendermode){
           // do something when rendermode=live
         }
     }
 
   }
    Since:
    12 mei 2012
    Author:
    Dolf.Dijkstra
    See Also:
    "tools.gsf.config.inject.Bind"

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Bind.Scope scope
      Deprecated. 
       
      String value
      Deprecated. 
       

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the key name of the variable to bind
        Default:
        ""

      • scope

        public abstract Bind.Scope scope
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the match argument from render:lookup tag
        Default:
        com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.annotation.Bind.Scope.ics
